SELECT fu.date_fu rechargeTime, fu.sum_fu totalAmount, fu.count_fu count, zong.count_zong userCount, fu_new.count_new newUserCount, fpc.pc pc, fapp.app app FROM
(SELECT SUBSTRING(f.createDate, 1, 10) date_fu,SUM(f.amount) sum_fu,COUNT(*) count_fu FROM t_fd_user_fund f WHERE f.rechargeType='2' GROUP BY SUBSTRING(f.createDate, 1, 10)) fu
LEFT JOIN
(SELECT SUBSTRING(f.createDate, 1, 10) date_pc,SUM(f.amount) pc FROM t_fd_user_fund f WHERE f.rechargeType='2' AND f.source='pc' GROUP BY SUBSTRING(f.createDate, 1, 10)) fpc ON fu.date_fu=fpc.date_pc
LEFT JOIN
(SELECT SUBSTRING(f.createDate, 1, 10) date_app,SUM(f.amount) app FROM t_fd_user_fund f WHERE f.rechargeType='2' AND f.source='app' GROUP BY SUBSTRING(f.createDate, 1, 10)) fapp ON fu.date_fu=fapp.date_app
LEFT JOIN
(SELECT SUBSTRING(f.createDate, 1, 10) date_zong,COUNT(*) count_zong FROM t_fd_user_fund f GROUP BY SUBSTRING(f.createDate, 1, 10)) zong ON fu.date_fu=zong.date_zong
LEFT JOIN
(SELECT SUBSTRING(f.createDate, 1, 10) date_new,COUNT(*) count_new FROM t_fd_user_fund f WHERE f.rechargeType='2' AND f.status='1' GROUP BY SUBSTRING(f.createDate, 1, 10)) fu_new ON fu.date_fu=fu_new.date_new
